page.description: Methods available for a Blob object.

discussion.p: A BLOB variable is a "Binary Large OBject" variable. It can contain any data. Alpha Anywhere provides the following functions and methods for manipulating BLOB variables.
Prefix the following methods with the <Blob> pointer, which is the same as the name of a BLOB variable. EG:

section.example: dim bb as b bb = "Alpha" ? bb.PEEK(2) = 108.000000

description.p: *[Peek]* functions read content at a location inside blob.
*[Poke]* functions write content at a location inside blob.
